name: Apparition
description: First-person survival horror with ghosts and demons. Find yourself smack in the middle of a haunted forest in the dead of night. Talk to spirits through your Spirit Board. Capture evidence of the paranormal, but beware, fiercely aggressive demons are on the hunt.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 3.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 3.2GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 680 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
